scripts.generate-webp: find public -type f \( -iname \*.jpg -o -iname \*.png \) -execdir convert '{}' -set filename:new '%t' -format webp '%[filename:new].webp' \;
scripts.generate-avif: find public -type f \( -iname \*.jpg -o -iname \*.png \) -execdir convert '{}' -set filename:new '%t' -format avif '%[filename:new].avif' \;
scripts.generate-jpg: find images -type f -iname \*.jpg -exec convert '{}' -set filename:new 'public/%[directory]/%[basename]' -format jpg '%[filename:new].jpg' \;
scripts.generate-png: find images -type f -iname \*.png -exec convert '{}' -set filename:new 'public/%[directory]/%[basename]' -format png '%[filename:new].png' \;
scripts.generate-all: npm run generate-meta && npm run generate-png && npm run generate-jpg && npm run generate-collage && npm run generate-webp && npm run generate-avif
